entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:08 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:08 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
